name: Monroe Elementary ExCel Program
description: Location: Monroe Elementary School 260 Madrid Street, San Francisco, CA 94112 PROGRAM INFORMATION GRADES participating: Entering Kindergarten-5th grades. - BEFORE SCHOOL CARE: Monday - Friday 7:30 am-8:30 am - AFTERSCHOOL CARE: Monday - Friday 2:40 pm-6:00 pm REGISTER QUESTIONS?
